channel.title: Copyright Law on GoingDutch.ai
channel.description: Recent content in Copyright Law on GoingDutch.ai

item.title: The end of GEITje 1
item.description: At the pressing request of Stichting BREIN, GEITje is no longer available as of today. All model files (the weights) and checkpoints have been removed from my HuggingFace repositories. GEITje was a Dutch-language large open language model with 7 billion parameters, based on Mistral 7B. It was (further) trained on 10 billion tokens of Dutch text, improving its proficiency in Dutch and its knowledge of Dutch-specific topics. As stated in the README, GEITje was partially trained in late 2023 using portions of the Dutch Gigacorpus.
